about_the_game:
This is the soundtrack of Towertale. All of the music tracks here are created by Mordi and Gina Loughlin. The soundtrack includes 23 tracks from the full game. Overall the full soundtrack is 39 mins and 6.6 seconds long in its duration.

Track list:


1. Towertale (Main Menu Theme) - 1:48
2. Childhood Memories (Young Lionel Theme) - 1:12
3. Things are fine as they are (Lionel Ending Theme) 1:14
4. Vengeful Sorrow (Faindrel Main Theme) - 1:14
5. Better Days are here (Faindrel Ending Theme) - 1:38
6. Curious Rabbit (Lord Snicklefritz Theme) - 1:10
7. Miracle's Playtime (Lord Snicklefritz Ending Theme) - 1:00
8. Requiem of Chaos ("Dark Echo"'s Theme) - 1:10
9. Hello, Traveler! (Gil's Theme) - 1:20
10. What is left of me (Creator's Main Theme) - 1:50
11. Giga Trouble (Giga Wolf Battle Theme) - 1:35
12. Slimebound (Slime King Battle Theme) - 1:20
13. Fun Smashing Time (Minotaur Battle Theme) - 2:03
14. A Dance with Death (Reaper Battle Theme) - 2:11
15. Tremendous Obstruction (Golem Battle Theme) - 2:08
16. Trapped in the Sand (Sand Worm Battle Theme) - 1:50
17. Don't take my gold! (Goblin Battle Theme) - 1:39
18. Truffle Scuffle (Mushroom Battle Theme) - 1:21
19. I Say Fight! (Samurai Battle Theme) - 1:51
20. Purest Light (Angel Battle Theme) - 1:52
21. Malicious Watcher (Eternal Watcher Battle Theme) - 2:43
22. My Darkest Self (Darkest Echo Battle Theme) - 3:00
23. The Fate of your Existence (The Creator Battle Theme) 2:09


Both composers worked hard on all of these tracks. If you like the music of Towertale you can support the composers by purchasing this.

name: Towertale - Official Soundtrack
short_description: Official soundtrack of the video game Towertale.
